ConfigFileName_Comment: Name to identify the config file - should match the config file name without the 'Config'
Instance_Comment: Name of the source instance - drives the generated index name.  Can be the same as the ConfigFileName, but simple is best.  Include a number for multi-instance.  ex. 'ms1'
SourceType_Comment: Used to select the source adapter to apply, only set this if you know what you are doing.  Recommend using a sample config to start from that already has this set.
BaseAddress_Comment: The base URL address of the source API
UserKey_Comment: The user key used for API authentication
OrgTokens_Comment: A list of organization tokens that will be processed
IssueSeverityMap_Comment: Maps the source severity name to one of the Saltminer severity names
VulnerabilityImportTypes_Comment: A list of specific vulnerability types to process
